message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I'm still not able to meet at $14,000. I'd like to propose $12,500 as a compromise. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
Bob, you're getting closer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference and settle at $13,250?  This feels like a fair deal for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to consider $13,000 as a counteroffer. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
